topics.body:
I was just reading TvTropes when I came across this amusing little mindbender: apparently, in Dungeons & Dragons, with the proper stat distribution, a thief is able to steal his own pants without noticing that he's doing it.

Wrap your head around _that_.

topics.body:
I'd hate to ask a stupid question, but why do so many people outright hate sex?

What I mean by this is that is look at any time any form of sexuality is shown in western mass media and how badly people freak their shit out and then try to push laws anti-sex laws.

Before 2001 buttsex was illegal in the USA; so if you had buttsex before 2001 you are a felon.  What's worse is that states like Louisiana are trying to reinstate anti-sodomy laws.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53dfa4ee63687210a14c0000#post_53dfa4ee63687210a14c0000
Wanting intercourse is part of our physique. It's a primal urge that cannot be silenced. No one really hates it, people who claim to do so are thinking they're too 'civilized' to partake in 'feral activities'. Rules of nature, pal. It's how we survived.
topics.author: 52f0834d63687261cba90300

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53dfa4ee63687210a14c0000#post_53dfa4ee63687210a14c0000

I think it in part has to do with the fact that for a really long time, much of western civilization was christianized and Abrahamic values were ingrained into the culture. If I remember correctly, one of these values is no sex before marriage, which alot of media shows in some form. Obviously we're moving away from said values now and there's the opposition to the shift as there always is.

Atleast that's my guess.
topics.author: 500757fd7f123b75a90003b1

topics.author: 5056c9e87f123b37f6012a34

topics.body:
"@Princessâ™ Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53dfa7d46368722063f60200#post_53dfa7d46368722063f60200
The problem with that though is that plenty of non-Christian civilizations also take a fairly dim view on sexual activity. Specifically though, they take a dim view on the _wrong_ sort of sexual activity- usually, that activity is _anything_ that doesn't result in the birth of a child.

That I think is more of a leftover from the days when humans still lived in tribes, and had to fight against one another for resources. Since the survival of the tribe took importance over everything else, any sort of sex that didn't result in the creation of good little soldiers to fight in future wars for you was probably frowned upon fairly heavily.
topics.author: 5043cdb47f123b72cc0032d3
